subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: Bryan Habana became South Africa’s record try scorer as his team showed little mercy in romping to a 12-try, 87-0 victory over Namibia in the Rugby World Cup in New Zealand.
snippet: Bryan Habana became South Africa’s record try scorer as his team showed little mercy in romping to a 12-try, 87-0 victory over Namibia in the Rugby World Cup in New Zealand.
